Package com.seailz.discordjv.action.interaction

Class MessageInteractionCallbackAction

java.lang.Object
com.seailz.discordjv.action.interaction.InteractionCallbackAction
com.seailz.discordjv.action.interaction.MessageInteractionCallbackAction
public class MessageInteractionCallbackAction extends InteractionCallbackAction
Used to react to an interaction with a message. This is an internal class to react to an interaction and should not be used by the end user.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Seailz
